power.title: Bristling Defense
power.fluff: You throw your arms wide and strike two foes, each with a different weapon

powerelement.name: Requirement:
powerelement.text: You must be wielding two melee weapons

powerelement.name: Primary Target:
powerelement.text: One creature

powerelement.name: Primary Attack:
powerelement.text: Strength vs. AC (main weapon)

powerelement.name: Hit:
powerelement.text: 2[W] (main) + Strength modifier damage, and the primary target cannot flank you until the end of your next turn.

powerelement.name: Secondary Target:
powerelement.text: One creature other than the primary target

powerelement.name: Secondary Attack:
powerelement.text: Strength vs. AC (off-hand weapon)

powerelement.name: Hit:
powerelement.text: 2[W] (off-hand) + Strength modifier damage, and the secondary target cannot flank you until the end of your next turn.

powerelement.name: Recharge:
powerelement.text: If you miss both attacks, you regain the use of this power at the start of your next turn.

power.title: Brute Strike
power.fluff: You deliver a powerful blow that rends flesh and shatters bone

powerelement.name: Target:
powerelement.text: One creature

powerelement.name: Attack:
powerelement.text: Strength vs. AC

powerelement.name: Hit:
powerelement.text: 3[W] + Strength modifier damage.

powerelement.name: Critical:
powerelement.text: This power deals +1[W] damage on a critical hit.

powerelement.name: Miss:
powerelement.text: Strength modifier + your weapon's enhancement bonus damage damage, and you immediately regain the use of this power.

power.title: Comeback Strike
power.fluff: A timely strike against a hated foe invigorates you, giving you the strength and resolve to fight on

powerelement.name: Target:
powerelement.text: One creature either marked by you or that bloodied you since the end of your last turn

powerelement.name: Attack:
powerelement.text: Strength vs. AC

powerelement.name: Hit:
powerelement.text: 2[W] + Strength modifier damage, and you can spend a healing surge to regain hit points equal to your healing surge value.

powerelement.name: Critical:
powerelement.text: You also gain temporary hit points equal to your Strength modifier on a critical hit.

powerelement.name: Miss:
powerelement.text: You gain temporary hit points equal to your Strength modifier, and regain the use of this power at the start of your next turn.

power.title: Driving Attack
power.fluff: You drive back your adversary with a hail of blows

powerelement.name: Target:
powerelement.text: One creature

powerelement.name: Primary Attack:
powerelement.text: Strength vs. AC

powerelement.name: Hit:
powerelement.text: 1[W] + Strength modifier damage, and you push the target 2 squares.
You gain temporary hit points equal to your Constitution modifier.

powerelement.name: Miss:
powerelement.text: Half damage, and you push the target 1 square.

powerelement.name: Effect:
powerelement.text: You shift the same number of squares you pushed the target, to a square adjacent to it.

powerelement.name: Secondary Attack:
powerelement.text: Strength vs. Fortitude
If the primary attack missed, you gain a +2 bonus to the attack roll

powerelement.name: Hit:
powerelement.text: 1[W] + Strength modifier + the number of healing surges you have spent damage, and you push the target 1 square and knock it prone.

powerelement.name: Miss:
powerelement.text: Half damage, and you push the target 1 square.
